s4-tab1-text:
1 - Limite de niveau: 185 lvl
2 - Lors de la création d'une arme épique, les options sont appliquées au hasard
3 - Les armes épiques peuvent être améliorées jusqu'à +10
s4-tab2-text:
1 - Limite de niveau: 185 lvl
2 - Lors de la création d'une armure épique, les options sont appliquées au hasard
3 - L'armure épique peut être améliorée jusqu'à +9
4 - Le port d'une armure épique offre un effet réglé
5 - 2 effet de réglage: Max. HP +3,000, réduction de dommages + 1%
6 - 3 effet de réglage: Max. HP +7,000, Compétence +705
Effet de 7 à 5 points: Résistance aux dommages critiques + 7%, Réduction des dommages + 2%
s4-tab3-text:
1 - Les articles épiques sont améliorés à l'aide d'Argate Condensé
2 - Argate condensé est fabriqué à l'aide du système de création d'article
3 - Mise à niveau +1 ~ +3: Argate de cuivre condensé
4 - Mise à niveau +4 ~ +6: Argate Argent Condensé
5 - mise à niveau +7 ~ +9: Argène Or Condensé
6 - Il est possible de siffler une prise épique d'éléments
7 - Il n'est pas possible de créer une option pour un élément épique
s4-tab3-content: Augmente le taux de réussite de 25%. Lorsqu'une mise à niveau échoue, Blacksmith's Grace empêche la destruction des objets et le niveau de mise à niveau baisse jusqu'à 3 niveaux. Il ne peut être utilisé que pour des articles [épiques].
s1-text: Each grade has a unique movement speed boost effect and Equip/Unequip option. Movement speed boost rate & Equip/Unequip option vary with rides.
s2-title: Rides now available with NPC Sergio in Ardeca!
s2-col1: > Buy Swift Box from him (max. purchase amount per day = 10)
s2-col2: > A Swift Box will give you a ride between ★ and ★★ (Plus 1x Swift Ruins)
s2-col3: > Collect 30x Swift Ruins to exchange with 1 Shining Swift Box
s2-col4: > Shining Swift Box will give you a ride between ★ and ★★★★
s2-col5: > There are also various ways to obtain rides in-game*
s3-title: Evolve your ride with Swift Crystal!
s3-sub-title:
- You can earn Swift Crystal by disassembling unused rides!
- Swift Crystal is also available in the D-Shop.
s4-sub-title1: Getting on/off time has been reduced!
s4-text1: - Your ride is now smarter and it will find the better (shorter) way to the destination
s4-text2: - Can set up maximum 10 way points on the way to the destination
s5-text: Get the most out of the new Item Creation system with these new packages. Containing all the items you need to forge a Helpyron weapon, armor set, or both, these packages are now available in the Shop. Bring the package contents to NPC Dora in Ardeca to start forging some epic gear!
s6-text: Various patterns exist per round (e.g. Monster Annihilation, Survival, Race Boss Round after the 4th round. You’ll be moved to Boss Room
s6-tab2-text:
Puppet NPC in Ardeca

Number of Entry: 1 per day, Submit an entry ticket

PLAY METHOD

[1] Select Play Mode (Difficulty)

Easy < Normal < Hard

FEVER MODE

Depending on how fast you clear each round, you can have ‘FEVER’ mode in the next round.

You can have Double EXP & Death Corridor Ranking Point with FEVER Mode.
s7-text: You are only able to use these buffs in Death Corridor
s8-sub-title: Auto Reward Event has been updated! (Click 'Gift Box' Icon on top-left corner) Play and hunt the monsters to get the buffs to help you *rank up* in Death Corridor.
s9-sub-title: Your goal is to get Death Corridor Emblem and here is how you get it
s10-title: How to get it to +50 is fairly easy
s10-sub-title:
Auto Reward Event has been updated! (Click 'Gift Box' Icon on top-left corner)
Play and hunt the monsters to get the buffs to help you *rank up* in Death Corridor.
s10-text: This argate can also be used to remove sockets from Weapon/Armor/Bracelet/Belt @ NPC Carment in Ardeca
s11-title: How to get Death Corridor +0 Emblem?
s11-sub-title:
NPC Marielle in Ardeca provides an exchange deal to everyone who earned Death Corridor Argate I from the Weekly Ranking Event.
You need 500 of them.
s12-title: You can also change II~V back to I
s13-context:
Join Death Corridor and get your highest score.

The score/ranking will be initialized everyday at 8AM CEST

Your 'highest' daily score of the week (Wednesday ~ Tuesday before the weekly maintenance) will be recorded as your weekly score and this will decide your ranking in Death Corridor.

But if you did not join Death Corridor less than 3 different days, your score won't be registered to the weekly ranking leader.
s14-text: Get xxx xxx xxx from the upgraded Karon's Fragment Indun
s14-location-text:
Crespo
Crespo Abyss (DK Server)
[1] Teleport to Crespo's Abyss I
[2] Move to the Centre of the map
Level Restriction: Lv. 185 or above
s15-title: Trieste Golden Key Update Package II: Golden Mechanic Wings Edition
s15-sub-text: Trieste Golden Key Update Package II: Golden Mechanic Wings Edition
s15-package-text:
\> Strengthened Veteran 7 Days Box (500% EXP Boost for Lv. 1~170 OR 300% Boost for all levels)
\> Ocarica of Eternity
\> Traveler's Backpack
\> Four Rune Package (Includes Explorer's Rune 5D, Meister 5D, Incar 5D, Pumpkin 7D)
s16-title: Trieste Golden Key Update Package II
s16-left-text:
\> Trieste's Golden Key 10x
\> Trieste's Golden Key 10x
\> Special Golden Box
s17-title: Also, Swift Crystals and Blacksmith's Blessings are available in Web Shop
